content: i love big eyelets i cannot lie… and i love how eyelets knit up in this aran weight yarn you can also used a worsted weight yarn the eyelets will still be delightful gauge is critical if you are starting with one skein of woolfolk tov there are comments in the pattern about where to stop early if you are playing yarn chicken i had only a few yards left when i completed my sample this is a small shawlette my sample was 50 inches 127 cm long and 9 inches 23 cm deep skills required knit purl k2tog ssk and double yarnovers this pattern was tech edited by aersknits 1 1 https //www ravelry com/people/aersknits **errata** row 2 of the stockinette section should read sl1 p to last 2 sts kfb k1 - download the latest version for this correction
